website_summaries.verdict: It's a gorgeous toaster by a brand with a remarkable reputation –  but you can find models for a fraction of the price that rival its looks and durability.
pros: A state-of-the-art toaster, as it has patented features including a well-built steel insulated body and durable preheat elements
Stylish – owners brag about the unique shade of red
cons: Extremely expensive for a toaster, and considering the price, the crumb tray is surprisingly flimsy
Doesn't fit or toast evenly all types of bread

customer_reviews.title: slots too short
customer_reviews.text: 1. was excited to try my new toaster but I went to cook my first toast and put brownberry oatnut bread in the slot - the slot was not long enough. 2. when I tried to turn it and toast two pieces of bread the second slot over cooked one side while all other were the same. why would you make a toaster, so very expensive, and not be able to accommodate all standard breads?
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Try before too late to return
customer_reviews.text: Try before it is too late to return. Regular size bread does not fit. Cut in half and the bottom of the bread burns. Complete and total waste of money and I purchased the extra gadget for warning croissants and its to big to toast. Also takes up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mahar

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks amazing and works beautifully. I ordered the 4-slice in glacier blue and I have used it everyday for over a month with no issues. I love that it doesn't pop up when it's done, so my toast stays warm in the machine until I fetch it. Very happy with the purchase, it's a bit spendy, but likely the last toaster I will buy. The toaster is solid and looks great on the counter, my old toaster was an eyesore and had cheap parts that were broken off. This thing is a tank!
customer_reviews.author: JkR64

customer_reviews.title: The fire department no longer has to show up.  Huzzah!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to learn which settings to use for darkness/timing. We even had the fire department show up for the smoke alarms from a burnt piece of toast. Sigh. But the Dualit is SO cute, I made myself persevere, and I now know how long to toast an English muffin versus homemade bread versus commercial bread versus a bagel. I've learned to put the setting on 2 for tall toast and use the lifter to turn it upside down halfway through. I now make perfect toast every time, and the fire department no longer has to come to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter81

customer_reviews.title: Not Made in China !
customer_reviews.text: It's an expensive, quirky toaster - definitely English. It takes time to figure out as it can easily burn the bread. It supposedly serviceable so hopefully it will last a long time. It reminds me of the old toasters my family had when I was growing up, I'm trying to get off the made in China train, not easy to find a toaster NOT made in China. Dualit was open that some parts are from China but assembled in UK. Once figured out it does the job, also bought the rack that's a nice addon.
customer_reviews.author: J. romano

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is truly a work of art. It's so well made and it toasts extremely well. The best part is how it looks and feels, it's like a nice work of art. You can feel the care and pride that went into making this machine. I normally don't spend upwards of $200.00 on a toaster but in this case, it's 100% justified. I'm so pleased with my new toaster, I'm sure you will be too. It's much nicer than the SMEG, that's a Chinese made toaster and it's a gimmick. This is the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were mainly looking for a toaster that wasn’t made in China. I was hesitant to pay this much for a toaster, but with it being made in the UK and the fact that the copper color matches our kitchen, we went for it. We have had the toaster for over 6 months now and we are not disappointed. It toasts bread evenly, and has the option to do 1-4 pieces at a time, which is nice. We haven’t had any problems with it at all and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Quirky but you gotta love it
customer_reviews.text: An authentically retro toaster that is a cut above in terms of quality and appearance. It's pricey. And there is no sensor or pop-up feature; instead, it toasts via a timer and you pop the toast with a hand lever. You have to watch this fella closely, or he will over-toast, under-toast, and everything in between. Set off the kitchen smoke detector twice. Had the fire department arrive once. Not for the buyer who just wants a perfect piece of toast . For the buyer who wants a quirky, well-crafted, good-looking addition to their household. A new member of the household who just happens to be a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster that will also last for generations
customer_reviews.text: I got so tired of buying high end toasters only to have the electronics fall. I was remembering my grandparents Toastmaster with the clock mechanism and its comforting ticking noise as it cranked out prefect toast every morning for over 50 years. In doing research...i found the Dualit toaster.. Decidedly low tech but amazingly well built and 100 percent repairable. No cheap plastic, no knobs that snap off for no reason. The best thing... The toast... Lightly crunchy on the outsize and soft and warm on the inside... Never dried out The other best thing.... You never ever need to buy another toaster... Ever!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two months
customer_reviews.text: We had the old version of this toaster for over 10 years and loved it. On this one the part that pops the toast broke off after 2 months. Is it even legal to sell such poor quality?
customer_reviews.author: Patrol

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad and I couldn't believe he wanted a $200 toaster. I thought it was cool it has a manual lever that doesnt pop up when the toasting is done (keeps the bread toasty). Hell it even has a defrost setting and I was surprised how evenly warm the bread came out. Overall I don't think I could justify spending so much for a toaster for myself. 5/5 stars because my dad loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but close. I have come to hate Chinese toasters. Cheap ones, expensive ones. Hi end Low end. It doesn’t matter. They are all junk. The Dualit looks old timey, but the guts are pretty modern and without the cheap electronics like the Chinese bandits. You’ll need to spend some time with the settings, but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: fred m pollock jr

customer_reviews.title: Decide based on form.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster aesthetically, and I like the manual toast popper lever because 1) Having the toast remain inside the toaster until your remove it keeps it warmer, 2) the lever can be used to adjust where the bread sits inside the toaster- useful for breads with small ends. One star off for uneven toasting- the bottom is often light. (So you may need to adjust the bread position up a bit, using the lever). I think this toaster falls mostly into the "If you know you want it, you'll probably like it. If you resent the price don't expect to be wowed."
customer_reviews.author: PickyChick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dualit in England and it was good. Bought one in US and it is terrible. Build quality is poor, bread slices and bagels do not fit without cramming them in the slots, toasting is very uneven, exterior gets very hot to touch. Too expensive to be so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R. Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: We have only ever had these toasters since I was a child and they are amazing. Toast perfectly, and are easy to clean. You have the choice of how many slices are toasting, 1 or 2 or 2 or 4, depending on the model. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster was meant to be a lifetime purchase
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was expensive but I thought I'll never have to buy another toaster again in my life. I was wrong. It sticks and I burn toast ALL THE TIME because the timer stops but the toaster keeps heating. I'm sorry I spend so much on this item. Just get a throwaway toaster for $20 and do what everyone else does and throw it in a junk heap after a year or two and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Keesh

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: The machine is lovely to look at but a normal slice of bread doesn't fit! I can only use smallish slice or cut larger pieces in half. It browns nicely but can be a bit persnickety about how long to set the timer. It's mechanical and I like that, but it's also a little more difficult to get it exactly the same email. I bought mine refurbished and it works exactly as promised and I couldn't find a mark on it. Maybe someone returned it because of the slot size issue.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: ... to imagine that there is such as thing as good toast. The bread is toasted without being dried ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to imagine that there is such as thing as good toast. The bread is toasted without being dried out. If you are lucky enough to be the person that makes banana, zucchini,and other quick breads, don't bother with any other toasters. Bagels are toasted and warmed through and stay soft without ripping out your front teeth when you bite into them. The toaster itself is very attractive and looks great sitting out on the counter. My favorite feature: lifting the toast up manually so that it stays warm until you are ready.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer choate

customer_reviews.title: Tired of replacing junk toasters every two years?  This one is for you.
customer_reviews.text: update! December 2019 and we are still happy with this purchase and use it daily. The last roasted you will ever buy. The last toaster we purchased only toasted one side of the bread. That's right, brand new and within weeks, the heating elements were burned out. When I added up how much we spent on toasters in just the past few years, I'd have come out ahead to buy this one. Every member of my family has been impressed with the function, and our resident engineer thinks the mechanics are genius. Whatever, I know my parents had one for about 30 years, and when they retired it, it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love my litte red toaster
customer_reviews.text: We use this toaster in my house daily. I will say that not every piece of toast comes out looking the same but each piece of toast does come out the same toast tan level, meaning I don't have one burnt piece and one lightly tan piece, they all come out lightly tan. I don't think I would purchase a larger size but I would hope this one lasts forever but if not I would repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but worth it?
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this toaster is beautiful, and it seems to be built well. We have been using it for the past three years, around once or twice a week. It toasts slowly, but very evenly. Of course, someone in the family was fooling with the controls and we thought it was broken, one side not working) so the one/two slice control seems very unnecessary (and in our case confusing). I paid $229 for it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Post

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Dualit products for my whole family. Finally at 70 years of age, I decided to treat myself. Imagine my disappointment when I unpacked the product and found it to be dented on one side. I live in the Caribbean so to send it back through shippers etc. is impracticable. It does work fine so i will enjoy having it, but as the packaging was intact, i can only imagine that this was a "second". Very disappointing! WOuld definitely NOT recommend this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect toast
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I paid this much for a toaster! I absolutely love it! I think it is something that will last a long time. Gonna leave my Mason Cash mixing bowls to my niece and this toaster to my nephew. Love it’s simplicity and practicality- and I can order replacement parts and fix it if I need. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: pl

customer_reviews.title: Story of two toasters
customer_reviews.text: Second one; bought the first red Dualit toaster some 12 years ago and it just now stopped working. Did not want to wait for a rehab (already got my money's worth) so we got a nearly identical replacement from Amazon. Hard to say too much about the quality except the new toaster appears to have improvements. Have used the new toaster once so far and the toast was perfect. Thanks Dualit. And as an aside, Amazon's price was as good as I could find anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: WHY
customer_reviews.text: Why would I spend almost 10x the amount for a toaster? Because it works and toasts the bread, roll, bagel as it should be. I don't have to stand there as a human timer. I can keep this forever and replace parts as needed. So it will be better environmentally. PLUS with the lift up feature I am able to check my toast. So if you are particular then this may be a good choice. Having it be azure blue is only a plus, well maybe a bit more than that!
customer_reviews.author: K. Krewer

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I have found
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster I have ever had. Doesn't dry out your toast like every other toaster on the market today. Especially toaster ovens. This is how toast used to be. How it should be. Moist and fluffy on the inside and toasty on the outside. Yum! And the grilled (vegan) cheese insert thingie works well too. Not to mention this thing is retro gorgeous. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool. Slots are too thin for all but the most modest size of sandwich
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months the timer crapped out. This is a countdown timer for toasting timing. Because it stuck in the middle of a job the toast went up in flames and set off our smoke alarm with ensuing hysteria. Like the British Empire this design is a little out of date.
customer_reviews.author: thomas cherry

customer_reviews.title: Raise a toast to DUALIT
customer_reviews.text: Think of this toaster as a long term investment. The previous one that I owned lasted at least twenty five years. Sometime, you get what you pay for. This is a well made appliance, hard to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: It ticks the entire time it is toasting. And if you pull your toast out early, it will continue to tick. It takes forever to toast, and when it is finally browned, you have a piece of melba toast. The slots are not wide enough to handle a hamburger bun or English muffin without getting stuck or burning. I feel like such a sucker to spend so much on this toaster. It is too late for me to get my money back, but do not waste yours!
customer_reviews.author: Anne T Masillo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toaster bc I've had a classic Dualit toaster in the past that I loved. The toaster arrived damaged, so I sent it back and Amazon sent me a replacement immediately. This toaster is exactly what I expected it to be. It makes beautiful toast, perfect every time. It is also a nice design piece and looks great in my kitchen. You can't go wrong with this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael L Walters

customer_reviews.title: I love toast!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many high quality toasters, and I predict that this toaster will be the last one I ever need to buy. Not only is the machine good looking and of highest quality... it makes the BEST toast! Seriously, the absolute best toast ever.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is beautiful and well made. I am not experiencing some of the issues reviewers had prior to my purchase. This unit is beautiful and came packaged securely. The settings are more user friendly than the last generation of Dualit. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Clunky and unintuitive. I was expecting fast toasting as with some other from the brand but this one’s a turtle on valium. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: GriffenDude

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my first Dualit during a relocation move so I finally replaced it with this azure one. Love it! The color of the toaster is exactly as shown and it's a Dualit so mechanically speaking it's definitely the best on the market. My favorite feature was, is, and always will be the warmer; I love how it keeps popped toast fresh and warm so I don't have to stand there and wait on it, frantically butter the toast the second it's done, and then hope my eggs finish cooking before the toast goes cold and soggy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina E

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOASTER WITH STYLE
customer_reviews.text: i have always wanted a dualit toaster but found them to be very expensive! well this year for christmas i bought the two slice for myself. i loved it at first sight. it browns extremely well, especially the english muffins. i especially like the lift function as you can check the doneness without canceling the cycle. i am sure you will like it as much as i do. as one reviewer said, i'm a toaster snob!!! by the way, it looks amazing on the counter. some people by things to look good on the counter and don't use them, but this you will always use and it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Tsolas

customer_reviews.title: Quality All The Way
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. It replaces our old Dualit toaster that finally died after 30 years. The new Dualit is just as good. Solid, handmade, and an excellent long-term addition to our kitchen. FIVE+ STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D. Berges

customer_reviews.title: Quality built toaster like you would have found her 50 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Quality built toaster like you would have found her 50 years ago. I love toasted bread, and although it doesn’t toast every inch of the bread exactly the same color it’s more than adequate. I have gone through several $50+ toasters in the last few years and they didn’t toast any better, looked cheap and broke within the year. I love that placement elements and parts can be purchased and replaced reasonably. Well worth the extra expense. I wish I could find more appliances that met these criteria.
customer_reviews.author: christina j. anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful robust toaster
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful robust toaster, I love it. It seems to toast more evenly than other toasters I have used. Other toasters produce more dark brown (or char) on the bits of bread that stick out farther than the recessed parts of the bread. The Dualit toasts the whole surface of the bread evenly if that's important.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted quality toaster.........not another of those overpriced, plastic-y, aluminum American designer 'toaster'. This Dualit toaster is made in England with quality parts, designed by a engineer who knew what he wanted to create. The toaster performs beautifully whether toasting 1 or 2 slices. And, there is even a special function whereby just the cut side of a bagel or English muffin is toasted. I was sure there would be somebody in the world who still produces a quality product, and now I have found ONE. I love this toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Sandbar

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The toaster would not heat, light did not work -- only the timer appeared to work. Very disappointing. We may try one more, although this experience does not inspire much confidence in a $300 toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My Dualite toaster was a complete dud.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery but toaster exploded with pop and white light when I tried to use it. Never heated. My last Dualite toaster I had for 14 years before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointed. My sister has had hers for ten years. I wanted a lifelong toaster. Ugh. After two weeks, it would only toast 1/2 of each side of the bread. Each element only glows 1/2 of each side. By the time I got off my butt to exchange with Amazon vendor I missed the 30 day window by a week. Now I have to toast and then rotate my bread 180 degrees to get the whole thing toasted. Buy American. It'll be easier to get replaced under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely made in the UK (see photo)
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions first to understand what level to use for the particular type of bread and toasting you require.
customer_reviews.author: KhalDrogo

customer_reviews.title: It toasts evenly and has a setting for bagels.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works very well, toasts evenly. My daughter has had her's for 17 years and it still works well, it is made of metal and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toaster
customer_reviews.text: If perfect toast is your thing with a toaster that’s made in the UK and hand signed by the builder then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: raymond j pasquale

customer_reviews.title: At last I have my Dualit toaster
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the toaster, I’ve wanted one for years, as I’ve know a few people who’ve had the toaster for a decade. Looks really stylish also.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this toaster works well and looks great. You will not find a build quality like this anywhere it's just very simple and works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we were so sad to lose our toaster
customer_reviews.text: When we moved out of our London flat, we were so sad to lose our toaster. So excited that Dualit makes a US brand. Our UK toaster was only two slices so having 4 is a great upgrade. Looks very nice on the counter and makes great toast.
customer_reviews.author: SHEYO

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this toaster, we had the same one in the UK, this version seems to toast the bread very slowly, we have to toast it for three minutes to get it brown, perhaps this is more to do with the UK voltage system?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. D. Waddington

customer_reviews.title: This toaster does not toast bread, it burns bread ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster does not toast bread, it burns bread. It's solidly constructed, however, the mechanism it uses for toasting time is far from perfect
customer_reviews.author: Magdaline J Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as older version
customer_reviews.text: This Dualit toaster is not the same quality as my last one. It makes a snapping sound while toasting and the temperature dial has to be turned all the way around to toast properly. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT toaster
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many toasters and they are throw aways. Other toasters have fancy controls and settings. The 4 slice Dualit is basic but less things to go wrong. Great toasting, +A — 10 star in my book
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the reviews say
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but toasts unevenly. Not worth the price. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: amany anis

customer_reviews.title: First Class Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a first class toaster, hand made in England and very well built, I love the peak feature.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Green

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Made a great Fathers' Day gift! My dad loves that there are thin protective sheets (mica?) over the heating elements making it much easier to clean. Makes a great grilled ham and cheese with the sandwich cage add-on - just be sure to use cheese that doesn't get runny.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Becker

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Got this to match everything gold in my kitchen. So very retro and adorable. Works awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good but that's it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster based on the way it looked. BIG mistake. I have yet to make a piece of toast that evenly toasts. I wish I returned it the first time I used it. Unless you are toasting large slices of bread, do not buy this toaster. It only toasts on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: If you want quality over whiz-bang gadgetry, this is the best toaster in the world
customer_reviews.text: If you want quality over whiz-bang gadgetry, this is the best toaster in the world. Pricy but worth it. It cooks the bread evenly and consistenly, and even keeps it warm for a few minutes if you don't get to it right away.
customer_reviews.author: carl s

customer_reviews.title: it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions, it works like a charm. Don't follow the instructions, it doesn't. It's that simple. Built to perform. Built to last. It's the Rolls Royce of toasters.
customer_reviews.author: MPO

customer_reviews.title: Last toaster you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. My second one. First one is now over thirty years old and has retired to our summer house. Still works great after a rebuild that was very easy. Who else makes a rebuild toaster? This one is even better as it has wider slots to take thicker bread.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan I. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: While it might seem crazy to spend the kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: While it might seem crazy to spend the kind of money on a toaster that Dualit charges, the reality is, this will be the last toaster I buy. These things are a life-long purchase. If you use a toaster often and have a philosophy of buying quality, so you only have to buy one, instead of buy cheap which probably means buying many over the course of years, this is the toaster for you. In fact, this will probably be passed down to the children, it's that well built. This is a bomb-proof appliance. Spend the money and consider it your last toaster.
customer_reviews.author: F. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works well and is small. Has a nice look to it, lots of metal, less plastic. I do not understand why it cost as much as it did. Very simple to operate. Keeps your toast warm till you get it. All and all looks good on the counter and doesn't take up a lot of space. Your toast is evenly toasted on both sides. It's what a toaster should be.
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, narrow aperture prevents toasting wide bread.
customer_reviews.text: Peerless quality construction, timeless design. However, too narrow to accommodate even modest width (5”+) bread. (It does however have quite a thick slot, so roasting muffins or bagels should not be an issue).
customer_reviews.author: BritBlaster

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOTAS GOOD IN SO MANY WAYS/ THE TOAST TAKES LONGER TO ...
customer_reviews.text: THE TIMER ON OUR OLD ONE WENT SO WE BOUGHT A NEW ONE. ITS NOTAS GOOD IN SO MANY WAYS/ THE TOAST TAKES LONGER TO TOAST AND THE TOASTER ITSLEF FEELS TINNY NEXT TO THE OLD ONE
customer_reviews.author: BONFOGLIO

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product for the expense
customer_reviews.text: Had this toaster for only 17 months and it suddenly stopped working. Way too expensive of a product to already be broken.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but an expensive toaster that can barely get the job done. Next time I'll be shopping for something more reasonably priced..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Solid
customer_reviews.text: My favorite toaster; simple & solid. Purchased this as a replacement for my 30 year old one.
customer_reviews.author: Shane J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heat setting does not seem to be consistent and toast browning not even
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the tjhird is awesome, vivid red
customer_reviews.text: So this is the third time lucky, the first two were faulty, I had a new one sent out immediately, the tjhird is awesome, vivid red, this is s kitchen piece to last a lifetime, thank Amazon for seeing this through
customer_reviews.author: AZ customer

customer_reviews.title: dualit makes an awesome toaster. cant go wrong here
customer_reviews.text: these duallit toasters are really first class. i have two of these. my first one lasted about 15 years. an awesome well built toaster.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tenison

customer_reviews.title: Silly
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced for a toaster. Silly. Also the sandwich thing works for s***
customer_reviews.author: Jason D. Mills

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this toaster last month (October 2015) and LOVE it! This product is very high quality construction ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster last month (October 2015) and LOVE it! This product is very high quality construction and high quality materials. It gives the desired results every time it is used. This is our second Dualit toaster for a seasonal home. Our first was purchased many years ago and still functions perfectly with almost daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: When you first get it in just turn on all burners like the manual says
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. When you first get it in just turn on all burners like the manual says. The toast actually does taste better probably because of variable heat during the last phase (defrost).
customer_reviews.author: MNP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster on the market. I replaced a brand new Wolf.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: It is a solid beast. I'd hoped for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid beast. I'd hoped for a little more power to toast quickly. It is rated at 1250 watts but doesn't seem as hot as my old Sunbeam of similar rating. Alas the Sunbeam died.
customer_reviews.author: Gejsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly toasted bread
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 slice toaster 10 years ago. Still works great. This toaster was for gift.
customer_reviews.author: delores malskis

customer_reviews.title: Hot Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I use my toaster a few times a day. I usually have to replace every year, because we live in a throw away society where products are not meant to last. A few hundred dollars for a toaster is a lot of $$ to spend, but I'm hoping it will last for a long time. So far, so good...it toasts bread and looks good on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Joycee

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best toaster in the universe ...
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these at a rental house a few years back and finally pulled the trigger on buying my own. Solid construction, simply impeccable toasting quality, and control by actual time instead of random numbers ... not to mention pop and peek. Worth every penny and the apple candy red is outstanding (great with reddish woods in a kitchen, cherry, lyptus, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Missing sandwich cage
customer_reviews.text: Just got my toaster but it didn’t come with the sandwich cage. In the product detail description it says comes with one. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Looks good and browns perfectly. Wish the slots were slightly larger for really thick slices
customer_reviews.author: Truckman

customer_reviews.title: Voltage rating
customer_reviews.text: This toaster had to be returned ... the specification lacked the information on the voltage .. it is only for use in the USA or other 110 V countries.
customer_reviews.author: tawa

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! Works wonderfully and the colors are so yummy. I wish I could have all the colors. But how many toasters does one person need LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christie Cambridge

customer_reviews.title: Back in the day appliances, even small ones, ...
customer_reviews.text: Back in the day appliances, even small ones, lasted for decades and were then passed down to relatives and friends. This toaster still has that value built in. It's solid construction and fool proof operation makes this a wonder to have in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Love This Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is absolutely fantastic. You have complete control over how browned you want your toast. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: cindy perez

customer_reviews.title: All show no go. Bought this toaster 7 months ...
customer_reviews.text: All show no go. Bought this toaster 7 months ago it takes almost two full cycles to brown toast and now the mechanical timer has stopped working. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Need the insert for the bagel .. insert rack is a must
customer_reviews.text: Always have used this brand classy .. must be careful not to scratch the shiny stainless steel section just soft cloth
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Dualit 2-Slice Toaster Chrome, what a cool Toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality made toaster, designed very well, the toast as others have said once toasted brings out flavors that a cheap toaster could never bring forth, High marks to Amazon that stated this toaster was like new, yet could not be sold as a brand new toaster, good job Amazon, and to the crafts man and woman from England that produced a quality product, the question posed, is the Dualit toaster the Rolls Royce of toasters?
customer_reviews.author: Gary Seldon

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best toaster ever. Worth the price. It makes the best toast. The first slice may take a little longer but once it's warmed up it doesn't take long for the toast to come out perfectly and quickly. Does bagels and english muffins just as great. I also like the fact that it is made to be repaired...not thrown in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nix

customer_reviews.title: I loved it which was why i was willing to invest ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for years and accidentally burned it up - no fault of the product. I loved it which was why i was willing to invest in another one. However, I have been having trouble regulating the temperature for toasting. I am surprised by this given I never had that problem before.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Eberhart

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Royce of Toasters
customer_reviews.text: Dualit 4 Slice Toaster, Red. Hand made in England. A mechanical lever to raise and lower bread/toast; a pull-out crumb tray; a mechanical timer with settings from 1 to just past 3. Very simple operation. Perfect toast every time-- *every* time. Wonder bread, artisan bread, toaster waffles, muffin-- all perfect. Barely toasted for the kids, nice and dark for dad. Outside stays cool no matter how much toast you make. One caveat: One of the slots looks like it's broken, but it's not-- that's for smaller or irregular pieces. Comes many colors, but red is beautiful. Yes, I would buy this again-- but I'm not gonna need to.
customer_reviews.author: bbj212

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: My second one many years of heavy use- reliable, easy to set for perfect performance
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one 22 years ago and finally am replacing it! Great toaster! Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Busenhart

customer_reviews.title: A Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this toaster for a long time. The original price in the stores scared me away but when a "special" came around on Amazon for this product, I decided to go for it. I have owned the toaster for over a year. The toaster is wonderful, extremely well built, easily cleaned, and can handle very thin to thick pieces of bread, including bagels. Also, I am able to control the "brownness" of the toast very easily -- no more overdone toast. Very happy that I chose to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerMama

customer_reviews.title: Prefect toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster, it toasts bread & English muffins perfectly! The crumb tray is in the front which makes it so easy to clean the tray prior to storing it in a cabinet. Great color .
customer_reviews.author: jeanne demetropolis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster, worth the extra money. It toasts very evenly and great for bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R

customer_reviews.title: Only toaster you ever need
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever made! I love it. I had one for 25 years and now my son is using it
customer_reviews.author: MCBKG

customer_reviews.title: The best over-priced toaster on the market...
customer_reviews.text: If you find yourself considering buying a $200 toaster then you already know that nothing else on the market can touch this. Yes there are toasters with better features and more technological advances but you aren't buying this toaster for that. The Dualit is all about timeless design and feel. I don't regret this purchase nearly as much as I should... One a side note, one of the toaster tray clips was broken in transit, I emailed dualit and had a replacement mailed out within a week...
customer_reviews.author: F. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Dualit four slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Recently received the toaster, and while the cost is significant, the construction is commercial. Toasts like no other toaster we have ever had.So far we are very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It is a great addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Dualit toaster many years ago. It is a great addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cuchi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Hope it lasts as long as my last classic Model.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen wigle

product_meta.title: Dualit 4 Slice Classic Toaster, Apple Candy Red
product_meta.description: Size:4-Slice| Color:Apple Candy RedThe NewGen Toaster offers all the styling and functionality you would expect from a Dualit toaster, along with the additional features of a defrost setting for frozen bread and the option to toast buns and bagels. The selector control allows you to heat either one or both slots. Designed for commercial use, the toaster is hand assembled in England and built to last, with an insulated stainless-steel body, variable controls and automatic turnoff. With extra wide 28mm slots to accommodate a Sandwich Cage and the award winning ProHeat elements, a patented design which increases toasting efficiency and element longevity, every toaster has a removable crumb tray and an adjustable rear foot. The Sandwich Cage, which has a built in drip tray, can be purchased as an optional accessory.
feature_bullets: With extra wide 28mm slots to accommodate a sandwich cage

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
